stories.headline: Regional markets react to policy shifts across borders
stories.summary: Multiple outlets report fresh movement in regional markets after new policy announcements, with analysts noting short-term volatility and longer-term uncertainty.

stories.headline: Cities expand pilot programs aimed at transit reliability
stories.summary: Reports highlight new pilot programs in multiple cities intended to reduce delays and improve rider experience, with mixed early feedback.

stories.headline: Technology supply chains adjust to new demand patterns
stories.summary: Coverage suggests manufacturers are rebalancing inventory and logistics as demand shifts across categories, affecting near-term output and pricing.
